snippet: Louisville guard Shoni Schimmel was taken eighth over all by the Atlanta Dream on Monday night, making her the highest Native American drafted in the W.N.B.A.
abstract: Louisville guard Shoni Schimmel is selected eighth overall by WNBA's Atlanta Dream, making her the highest drafted Native American in league's history; has attracted a devoted following through a combination of her flashy play and embrace of her heritage.
lead_paragraph: Louisville guard Shoni Schimmel was taken eighth over all by the Atlanta Dream on Monday night, making her the highest Native American drafted in the W.N.B.A.

headline.main: Schimmel Brings Flair and Pride in Heritage to W.N.B.A.
headline.print_headline: Schimmel Brings Flair And Pride In Heritage
